page.title: 20Schools involved and ref.no
page.content:
{ }Schools involved and their grid square number:
{ABBEY ROAD JUNIOR (6/10) {BEARWOOD JUNIOR (7) {BLEAKHOUSE JUNIOR/WARLEY INFANTS (5) {BRISTNALL HALL HIGH {CHAD VALE PRIMARY (12) {CITY ROAD JUNIOR (4/8) {LIGHTWOODS JUNIOR (9) {LORDSWOOD BOYS HIGH (11) {MOATFARM JUNIOR} {(1) {SHIRELANDS HIGH (3) {UPLANDS JUNIOR (2) { { The reference nos. have been included {in page titles where the content is {particularly relevant to that part of {the D-block only. Pupils and staff at {Bristnall Hall High collated and typed {in the information.
